briefTitle: An Open-Label Safety Study Of DIC075V (Intravenous Diclofenac Sodium) In Patients With Acute Post-Operative Pain
officialTitle: An Open-Label, Multiple-Dose, Multiple-Day, Non-Randomized, Single-Arm Safety Study Of Repeat-Doses Of DIC075V (Intravenous Diclofenac Sodium) In Patients With Acute Post-Operative Pain
summary: This is an open-label, multiple-dose, safety study of DIC075V in patients with acute post-operative pain following abdominal or orthopedic surgery.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Treatment Emergent Adverse Events (TEAEs) and Serious Adverse Events (SAEs)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Day 1 of dosing up to maximum of 37 days after last dose (maximum up to 42 days)
